website_summaries.verdict: Distinctive timepiece with two-tone stainless band and eye-catching green dial, with sapphire crystal and luminescent hands. Accuracy, durability, beauty, and functionality.
pros: This is a super-functional watch in a unique package, with a battery life indicator, rotating bezel, military time, and date window in addition to the usual timekeeping functionality
Water-resistant to 300 feet or 100 meters – suitable for swimming and snorkeling
cons: Larger watch face may not be desirable for some users
May be too small for some wrists

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful High Quality Ladies Watch
customer_reviews.text: Some people say that it's a black bezel surrounding the face of the watch.......its not. It's a very dark green, just as the face is a very dark green. The lighting in the surrounding area (indoors and outdoors) influence how much green you see. It is very dark, but that also makes it very cool looking. My wife loves it. Super high quality band and brand. Hard to find a great looking green watch.......this is it.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Mathison

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but be careful who you buy it from
customer_reviews.text: If you buy the watch from Amazon you are good to go, as noted it comes with the manufacturer's warranty. If you buy it from Watchsavings, it does NOT come with the manufacturer's warranty. If there is a problem, guess what? You have to send it to Brooklyn. Well I live on the West Coast so that isn't very practical. Want to send it back to them within 30 days? No problem! You pay the shipping cost back to them AND they take off an unknown amount for their shipping cost to you. Not such a great deal after all! :(
customer_reviews.author: ELA

customer_reviews.title: Do LOVE this watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a magnificent watch. It’s beautiful and very substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Hanberg

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. For the ladies: I get more compliments on it than any jewelry I might accent it with. For the guys: it's tough, it's practical, and with the warranty it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fun and sporty but beautiful ladies watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my wife and she was very pleasantly surprised. I wanted to give her something that was nice to look at and still water proof (she has some nice dress watches but can't get any of them wet). She hasn't taken this watch off since receiving it. The watch looks just as good as the photos and it arrived on time via standard shipping. A good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: stopped working 90 days after receiving
customer_reviews.text: online help said they could only have the watch shipped back with a 15% restocking fee ($70) and pay for shipping. It STOPPED WORKING - what part of defective don't they know?
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, High Quality Watch
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch. It had a sporty, solid feel to it but was not too large for my small wrist. This is a great gift to yourself or to someone else. Very attractive watch.
customer_reviews.author: lotoole

customer_reviews.title: wear on these watches actually makes them look better in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I challenge anyone to find a more accurate, reliable, durable, and aesthetic watch for the money. I have put my Swiss army watches through a lot...salt water fishing, work, exercise, swimming...you name it, and they keep going. In fact, wear on these watches actually makes them look better in my opinion. One suggestion, include extra links in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and color
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this watch. The size is perfect, larger than most womens watches but not quite as big as a unisex or men's watch. Perfect for the person seeking a larger watch that does not over power. The color rich blue color is classic.
customer_reviews.author: Nantucketdreaming

customer_reviews.title: This picture looks blue, but its more black in person
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch because it had a blue face and was very excited to give it to my wife for our 10 year anniversary to mark "time" and was very disappointed that it wasn't really blue and ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: anthony christensen

customer_reviews.title: Watch band pins
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but the band pins fell out after one wear. I’m disappointed. Threw out the box and can’t return. Off to a watch repair shop I go.
customer_reviews.author: Myron

customer_reviews.title: So far, excellenr
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I gave it to my girlfriend and she is very pleased with the watch as it is quite handsome. It is too early to tell about the reliability but I have a similar watch and it has served me well for a number of years.
customer_reviews.author: ctman

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Exactly what I wanted. This price was $175 less than I saw in the jewelry department at a high-end department store. So I was thrilled to get this for the price here on Amazon. A quality timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: The quality is there
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with the watch or the rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: Constance N. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality & style. More attractive than picture. The color is a dark blue ... exactly what I wanted for the summer & boating. Rubber band is comfortable. Hour & second hand illuminate in dark. Great looking watch for day or night!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's exactly what I wanted. It's very comfortable and looks sporty. The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: linda hardee

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Watch was exactly like it was described. Very good looking watch prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: this is a great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What can I say, this is a great looking watch. Although the outer bezel is actually a deep green, it often looks black, giving the watch a chameleon effect. The green and gold give the watch a very rich appearance. When my friends saw this one, they all wanted one!
customer_reviews.author: Watchman57

customer_reviews.title: I prefer small size watches, and this one fits ...
customer_reviews.text: I prefer small size watches, and this one fits 100% my expectations. Classy, sportive style, quality and a reasonable Price.
customer_reviews.author: kekemart

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice-looking watch with deep green face and bezel. Contrasting hands are easy to read, and the date is reasonably large. Keeps time accurately. The bracelet fit my 7" wrist perfectly. If your wrist is larger you will need to obtain extra links. The crown is NOT screw-down (confirmed with Victorinox) so it's not really water-resistant.
customer_reviews.author: KCZ41

customer_reviews.title: still it looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be bigger, still it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: HY Sun

customer_reviews.title: Victorinox 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice watch we have purchased it for mom and it worked very well
customer_reviews.author: Danilo M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design Color is great. It was bought for sports wearing i.e. horseback riding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful watch I love swiss army i am a fan
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. Love the navy. I wish the dials lit up at night.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D. Travis

customer_reviews.title: This is a much better watch.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Bought this to replace another Victorinox which started malfunctioning after 3 months. This is a much better watch.
customer_reviews.author: JoeC

customer_reviews.title: Victorinox Maverick Swiss Army Quartz Blue Dial Women's Watch - (241609)
customer_reviews.text: Victorinox Maverick Swiss Army Quartz Blue Dial Women's Watch - (241609) Beautifully made. Deep, sophisticated marine blue. Excellent craftsmanship. But, have never had any problems with sapphire crystal Swiss Army watches. Will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie N.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! It's comfortable, sporty and the color matches with so many of my casual clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Dane D.

customer_reviews.title: Too small to label as Unisex
customer_reviews.text: Returned the watch due to small size. I have a small wrist so I honestly feel that advertizing this beautiful piece as Unisex is misleading. After returning I purchased the same version at 43mm. I rate the watch with 3 stars just because of the size. Otherwise a very nice watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Silvio

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it, It's too small for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it, It's too small for me, it is just good for women. I would like to return it. What a Have to do ??
customer_reviews.author: MARIO PARRA UGALDE

product_meta.title: Victorinox Swiss Army Women's Maverick Small Watch
product_meta.description:
Maverick Stainless Steel Watch. This 34mm women's watch is ready to take on the day ahead and is meant to stand up to everyday wear with a refined look for evenings. 

FEATURES 

Classic Look. Silver stainless steel chain-linked bracelet or fine-grain leather. Dependable Swiss Quality. High-quality materials are carefully crafted to create a piece you're proud to wear. Analog quartz movement. Water Resistant. Can reach underwater depths of 10 ATM/100 m./330 ft.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :5.5 x 4 x 5.4 inches; 1.41 Pounds
 * Item model number :241788
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 AAA batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :August 1, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Victorinox
 * ASIN :B0719LXT5M

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #308,296 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #2330 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #1419 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #90156 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars74 ratings Maverick Stainless Steel Watch. This 34mm women's watch is ready to take on the day ahead and is meant to stand up to everyday wear with a refined look for evenings. 

FEATURES 

Classic Look. Silver stainless steel chain-linked bracelet or fine-grain leather. Dependable Swiss Quality. High-quality materials are carefully crafted to create a piece you're proud to wear. Analog quartz movement. Water Resistant. Can reach underwater depths of 10 ATM/100 m./330 ft.
feature_bullets: REFINED LEATHER. Strong, substantial leather with a fine-grain texture. A refined strap with a distinguished look, the leather offsets the modern, sleek look of the technical face.
SWISS MADE. This Swiss Made watch features a unidirectional rotating bezel and a count-up scale. Case is crafted from high-grade hypoallergenic stainless steel. Analog quartz movement.

BLACK EDITION. Strong PVD coating offers a sleek, sophisticated look and a hardened protective coating. The Matte Black finish gives the watch a modern look and helps protect against scrapes and scratches.
WATCH DETAILS. 34mm. Screw-in caseback, date, end-of-life indicator, scratch-resistant, triple-coated, anti-reflective sapphire crystal. Water resistance: 10 ATM/100 m./330 ft.

TRUSTED QUALITY. Watches purchased from authorized retailers eligible for a 3-year limited warranty. Excludes battery life, normal wear and tear, improper handling, damage resulting from abuse, misuse, accidents or unauthorized repair.
